text: Alyx may refer to: *Alyx Vance, a leading character in the Half-Life series of video games. **Half-Life: Alyx, a virtual reality game centred on said character *The Adventures of Alyx, a 1976 science fiction anthology by Joanna Russ *Alyx, a sentient planet in the science fiction short story The Lonely Planet by Murray Leinster *ALYX Component Collection System, a device for conducting apheresis in blood donation *ALyX, a contestant on the second season of the American version of The Voice. *1017 ALYX 9SM, a fashion brand based in New York City.
title: Alyx
